attributes.action: publicly acknowledge majority support for an English Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every poll for the last few years have shown support amongst the general public for an English Parliament is not only increasing but is consistently between 65 and 70% in favour.

By contrast, the British government refers to a poll commissioned several years ago that is not available to scrutiny to "prove" that there is no support for an English Parliament.

To continue to claim that there is no desire for an English Parliament is a lie.  The Prime Minister should publicly acknowledge the majority support for an English Parliament as evidenced by every poll commissioned in the last couple of years.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
